tool_description: Validates supplier certifications, compliance status, and adherence to industry standards and regulatory requirements.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs to validate

required_certifications.description: List of required certifications (e.g., ISO9001, ISO14001, SOC2)

certification_age_limit.description: Maximum age of certifications in months

error_messages: Invalid supplier_ids: At least one valid supplier ID is required.
Invalid required_certifications: Certification names must be 2-50 characters each.
Invalid certification_age_limit: Must be between 1 and 120 months.
Certification not recognized: Some certification names are not in the validation database.
Validation service unavailable: Unable to verify certifications at this time.
Incomplete certification data: Some suppliers have incomplete certification information.
usage: Provide supplier_ids and required_certifications arrays. Optionally specify industry_standards, regulatory_requirements, and certification_age_limit. Returns certification status and compliance assessment for each supplier.

valid_certifications.description: List of valid certifications held by each supplier

missing_certifications.description: List of required certifications missing for each supplier
